Test Name: Chlamydia trachomatis and Neisseria gonorrhoeae Amplified RNA (Vaginal)
Purpose: To detect Chlamydia trachomatis and Neisseria gonorrhoeae RNA for accurate diagnosis of infection.
Container: Aptima vaginal swab transport tube (or equivalent swab tube designed for amplified RNA testing)
Equipment: Amplification/detection system (e.g., Hologic Panther System), vortex mixer, microcentrifuge, pipettes with aerosol-resistant tips
